text: Paul Courto is a retired Australian rules footballer who played for Hobart in the Tasmanian Australian National Football League. Courto played at full forward and was the league's leading goalkicker for the 1980 season. He was named at full forward in Hobart's "Official Best Team 1947 to 2002". ==References== Category:Living people Category:Australian rules footballers from Tasmania Category:Hobart Football Club players Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: Paul Courto
